Name: JetBrains 4.2.0: Edit snippets from your IDE
Update Summary: We’re bringing one of our most-requested features directly to JetBrains: Snippet editing. Make adjustments to your snippets without the Pieces desktop app.
MainBody:
With today’s release, we’re bringing one of our most-requested features directly into JetBrains: Snippet editing. Now, you can make adjustments to your snippets without opening the Pieces desktop app.

To edit a snippet in the JetBrains suite:

  1. Right-click in the code
  2. Select a snippet from the Pieces menu
  3. Select “View/Edit”
  4. Edit your snippet
  5. Hit ctrl+S or ⌘+S to save your edits

The edited snippet will be instantly ready for you to use.

Support

As always, if you run into issues or have feedback, please fill out this quick form or email us at support@pieces.app and we’ll be in touch as soon as possible!
